replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-8044-1-1.html
http://www.planetminecraft.com/mod/minecraft-multitool-mod-v-20/

請看清楚支援版本... Minecraft Beta 1.7...
以及安裝步驟... 東西都放對位置了嗎??

To install:
Press the start button type in run press enter and type in %appdata%
Then go to .minecraft/bin then open minecraft.jar with a archiving program
open Modloader and Multitools Mod and put the .class files in there
then open the "Put in mods folder" and put that stuff in a folder called "mods"
